abstract: Esteban Efraín Paredes Quintanilla (Spanish pronunciation: [esˈteβan paˈɾeðes], born 1 August 1980) is a Chilean footballer that currently plays for Chilean Primera División club Colo-Colo as a striker.
comment: Esteban Efraín Paredes Quintanilla (Spanish pronunciation: [esˈteβan paˈɾeðes], born 1 August 1980) is a Chilean footballer that currently plays for Chilean Primera División club Colo-Colo as a striker.
